ItemDatas.Name: Pale Sword
ItemDatas.Description: A common sword, used by many soldiers due to its ability to respond well at various situations. A blacksmith could upgrade it.

ItemDatas.Name: Gold Coin
ItemDatas.Description: Money have lost a lot of it's value since all the wars, but some people still accept it to buy some goods.

ItemDatas.Name: Potion
ItemDatas.Description: Can be used to restore some health. Filled with elexir at grave stone. Only a few know how to make these flasks.

ItemDatas.Name: Priest's Key
ItemDatas.Description: Key to the catacombs cells. It's covered with blood.

ItemDatas.Name: Catacombs Key
ItemDatas.Description: Key to the entrance of the catacombs. Belongs to the high priests of Prosperare.

ItemDatas.Name: Wedding ring
ItemDatas.Description: The words "FOR JEANNE" are engraved on the ring.

ItemDatas.Name: Book
ItemDatas.Description: Haa... if only I could read.

ItemDatas.Name: Priest's letter
ItemDatas.Description: It says: "The impious man has escaped, you must chase him to protect the secret."

ItemDatas.Name: Prisoner's letter
ItemDatas.Description: It’s written "FEBI" with blood, and it seems the word is incomplete. I guess he was talking about Febilis, but why?

ItemDatas.Name: Scroll
ItemDatas.Description: This contains an important message I should deliver to... someone, I guess.

ItemDatas.Name: Macabre Ring
ItemDatas.Description: This dark broken ring looks older than the catacombs themselves. An odd energy emanates from it...
